title: Directed Readings
description: Directed readings in an area of computer science of interest to the student and the instructor.
prerequisites: Prerequisite(s): Departmental permission, and registration in Level IV of an Honours program in Computer Science.
Interested students need to work out a proposal with a faculty member of the Department of Computing and Software
